DOC.brief_summary: This single center, open-label, randomized study will investigate the drug-drug interaction potential between multiple doses of RO7033877 and multiple doses of colistin methanesulfonate sodium (CMS).
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Clinical Study in Healthy Volunteers to Investigate the Drug-drug Interaction Between Multiple Doses of RO7033877 and Multiple Doses of Colistin Methanesulfonate Sodium (CMS)
DOC.criteria: Adult male or female (of non childbearing potential) healthy volunteers between 18 to 55 years Body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 30 kg/m2 Non smokers Use adequate contraception methods Evidence of active of chronic disease Regular consumption of drugs of abuse Infection with human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), hepatitis B (HBV) or hepatitis C (HCV) History of significant allergic reactions Abnormal blood pressure Clinically significant abnormalities (e.g. cardiovascular, laboratory values)
